function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of smart helmets for screening and identifying suspected cases of contagious diseases","Impact":"Potential failure to detect or identify individuals with contagious diseases, leading to spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and calibration of smart helmets, supplemented with manual checks and testing","Technologies":"Smart helmet technology, AI-based screening algorithms","People":"General public, healthcare workers, police officers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, law enforcement agencies"},{"Description":"Reliance on face and voice recognition technologies to reduce the need for touching surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of false positives or negatives, leading to potential exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular testing and calibration of recognition technologies, alongside manual checks and cleaning protocols","Technologies":"Face and voice recognition technology, AI algorithms","People":"General public, service providers, employees","Owner":"Technology companies, service providers"},{"Description":"Deployment of smart devices and robots equipped with UVC radiation for cleaning and disinfection","Impact":"Potential harm from UV exposure, incomplete disinfection leading to spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regulated use of UVC technology, safety training for personnel, manual inspection of disinfected areas","Technologies":"Smart devices, UVC radiation technology, robotics","People":"Cleaning personnel, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, cleaning companies"}]}
